review: I am happy because I am no longer at the mercy of the cable company. However when the device gets hot it stops receiving the signal from the casting device. If I am watching a program and Chromecast stops working in the middle of the program, I have to unplug it until it cools off. This takes 5 to 10 minutes, and it is a hassle to do, when I am in the middle watching television. It also could have come with better set-up instructions.Laura W.
author: Laura Williams

review: Plugged it in to the TV to show computer on TV, it works, you must have google chrome on your computer and enable it to cast. Clunky interface. Haven't used it since I set it up. Doesn't show computer screen on TV, it only shows what is inside the Chrome window, um hello Google my cheap Vizio 48" shows web pages without anything plugged into it, what else do you have? Also have an Apple TV and Digital camera hook up, Apple TV smokes this thing with both hands tied behind its back, I can flip my phone onto the tv by pushing one button on the remote to change channels, maybe the next generation will be better?
